page.title: Siebel Raises Forecast, Stock Up 16 Pct.
page.text: LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - Business software maker Siebel Systems Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=SEBL.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">SEBL.O</A> on Monday said third-quarter revenue would beat Wall Street estimates, driven by a rebound in licensing revenue, sending its shares up almost 16 percent.
